title: This Desk Is A

sentences.3106: skyscraperwhose pen hides a redwood.This paper is a heating systemwhose writing hides a cliff face This screen is a forget-me-not,whose mobile hides a fireplace,This pulse is a murderer,whose skin hides a traffic sign. Hidden skyscraper is a butter mountain,whose redwood is a funeral parlour,heating system is an arctic hare,whose cliff face is a woman’s eyebrow. This Forget-me-not is a whip-poor-will,whose fireplace hides a metallic road,This murderer is a modern dance,whose traffic sign hides a drowning man.

content: This Desk Is A swoon skyscraperwhose pen hides a redwood.This paper is a heating systemwhose writing hides a cliff face This screen is a forget-me-not,whose mobile hides a fireplace,This pulse is a murderer,whose skin hides a traffic sign. Hidden skyscraper is a butter mountain,whose redwood is a funeral parlour,heating system is an arctic hare,whose cliff face is a woman’s eyebrow. This Forget-me-not is a whip-poor-will,whose fireplace hides a metallic road,This murderer is a modern dance,whose traffic sign hides a drowning man.
